adjective.description: Of, relating to, or derived by the physicist James Clerk Maxwell; in accordance with or obeying Maxwell's law, equations, or distribution.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in The Electrician. From the name of James Clerk Maxwell + -ian<br>1980s; earliest use found in Time. From the name of Ian Robert Maxwell (born Jan Ludvik Hoch), Czechoslovakian-born British publisher + -ian.
